text: @SpeakerPelosi Not only were the tests for #coronavirus in high demand the ones that we had didn't freaking work properly! NO ONE in this country knows how many people walking around with this. Congress really needs to take control cuz Trump and his sycophants are gonna get us killed.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
